Name: Leviathans
Notes: Ancient marine rulers giving way to cephalopod (Kraken) rule

Name: Laurentia
Notes: Ancient continent where early plants spread

Name: Siberia
Notes: Ancient landmass colonized by early plants

Name: Hirnan
Notes: Great plant king uniting terrestrial plant empire

Name: Holonia
Notes: Province in Avalonia where Hirnan ruled

Name: Brachios
Notes: Brachiopod lineage struggling during plant rise

Name: Lingulus
Notes: Conservative brachiopod lineage suffering massive die-offs

Name: Glomerings
Notes: Plant-associated organisms mining rocks for fertilizer

Name: Agnos
Notes: Trilobite house falling during end-Ordovician extinction

Name: Ptychos
Notes: Trilobite house unable to continue story

Name: Silur
Notes: New ruler rising from Ordovician devastation
